greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest odd pseudoprimes to base n, not necessarily exceeding n. Compare with A007535 and A090086.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{k = 1}, While[GCD[n, k] > 1 || PrimeQ[k] || PowerMod[n, k - 1, k] != 1, k += 2]; k]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 11 2019 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 25 2003
